name: _BookingOptionRequest
description: Request object; refers to the Quote request or Booking request

columns.name: _bookingShipmentDetails
columns.description: Reference to the BookingShipment if required

columns.name: _bookingToUpdate
columns.description: Reference to the Booking to update

columns.name: _carrierProduct
columns.description: Reference to the Carrier product if known

columns.name: _unitsPreference
columns.description: Reference to unit preferences of the request (e.g. kg or cm)

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _involvedParties
columns.description: Information about other Parties involved depending on the context of use

columns.name: _transportLegs
columns.description: Reference to the Transport Legs of the proposed routing

columns.name: _knownShipper
columns.description: Indication if shipper is a Known Shipper as per TSA grant

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
